TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 803-804
TEI.2.document_title: John P. Coles to Stephen F. Austin, 05-25-1824

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 803-804

div1.p: in obedience to your official order to me Directed on February [2] last to Issue a Notice to Peter Whitaker William Fitzgibbons and William Whitaker Unless they Removed with their family and Effects out of the limits of this Colony within Three months from the date of said notice they would be liable [to fines?] and Penaltys noticed in said official Order a notice accordingly Issued from my office which has been Complied with in all its part within time given May the 25th 1824
